body:
I've seen many users with alts and never fully understood why people buy them. It seems like a big waste of money to me, unless there is a valid reason to actually buy one. 

What's your reason for an alt?
body_tagged:
I've seen many users with alts and never fully understood why people buy them. It seems like a big waste of money to me, unless there is a valid reason to actually buy one. 

What's your reason for an alt?
title: Why do people use alts?

replies.body:
1. To ban evade
  2. More power for factions
  3. To be able to play without people recognizing them
  4. To get a higher K/D on it
  5. To mess around and have both you and your alt on at once (and or boost)
replies.body_tagged:
1. To ban evade
  2. More power for factions
  3. To be able to play without people recognizing them
  4. To get a higher K/D on it
  5. To mess around and have both you and your alt on at once (and or boost)

replies.body: better stats
replies.body_tagged: better stats

replies.body: And a new name. ( you can have 2 name changes with an alt)
replies.body_tagged: And a new name. ( you can have 2 name changes with an alt)

replies.body: I prefer using alts for time lapse recordings and cinematics.
replies.body_tagged: I prefer using alts for time lapse recordings and cinematics.

replies.body: So staff aren't targeted or bugged, and they can relax. ;)
replies.body_tagged: So staff aren't targeted or bugged, and they can relax. ;)

replies.body: So I can record without the staff chat showing.
replies.body_tagged: So I can record without the staff chat showing.

replies.body: The main reason i wish i had an alt...
replies.body_tagged: The main reason i wish i had an alt...

reply_to.body: So staff aren't targeted or bugged, and they can relax. ;)
reply_to.body_tagged: So staff aren't targeted or bugged, and they can relax. ;)

replies.body:
I have many alts and I can say you many points why alts are great/bad if you abuse them:

  1. To be well-known c:
  2. To Ban Evade (I don't suggest this point, trust me.)
  3. To avoid being targetted (Ask DaGoldBrick...)
  4. To start a new account with new stats
  5. To abuse it, ex. to start a game faster if there aren't enough players (I don't suggest this point too, I got banned for my stupid alts so yeah xd)
  6. There are more reasons

hehehehe

replies.body: Why not?!?
replies.body_tagged: Why not?!?

replies.body:
Funny you ask.. Right now I'm AFK'ing at a gold farm in factions. I really want to PVP on Kohi right now, but since I have a lack of god apples, I feel as if the gold is more important. I then strongly consider buying an alt, so I can AFK and PVP at the same time. Then, I go to the forums, reload the page, and see this topic. 
Hope that answered your question xD

replies.body: For me, I go on alts to see if the staff are actually doing their job if I'm not online, besides, it's relaxing when I can play and not having to "spam" greet everyone.
replies.body_tagged: For me, I go on alts to see if the staff are actually doing their job if I'm not online, besides, it's relaxing when I can play and not having to "spam" greet everyone.
